body:
I'm trying to find an old doujinshi I used to read on Fakku before they went legit. I thought it was by Inomaru but I'm not seeing it. Was pretty similar to the first story in this collection, but it was more of a war camp prison. The female was a high ranking general/officer referred to as something like ice/blizzard/snow bitch. Early in the chapter she bit during a blowjob scene, and then later in the chapter she was pictured with a sign stating that blowjobs were risky.

Additionally I would be interested in any suggestions where the female threatens to bite, or is told not to bite during oral sex.
Tsubaki is such a chad for a women...
"This takes me back to when I was a kid, sticking rods inside the asses of frogs", we've all been there pal.
